events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position.
The candidateâ€™s application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on their resume keywords.
A recruiter has been assigned to follow up with the software engineer candidate promptly.
Completed the initial screening call; candidate showed strong fundamental knowledge of software development.
The candidate responded positively and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward with the interview process.
Scheduled the technical interview for the software engineer candidate on May 5th at 10 am UTC.
The technical interview was completed successfully; candidate demonstrated strong coding skills and problem-solving ability.
Scheduled HR interview for the candidate to discuss cultural fit and company values next week.
Completed the HR interview; candidate appears to be a good cultural fit and aligns well with company values.
The offer for the software engineer position has been proposed to the candidate with competitive compensation.
The candidate has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and interview experience.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer; onboarding process will begin shortly.
Initiated the onboarding process for the new software engineer starting next week.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the new software engineer fully onboarded.
